items.text: Random name generator - players get fun names like 'nerdy-octopus' on join
Player previews in room list - see who's in each game before joining
Public/Private room toggle - hosts can hide rooms from the public list
Enhanced waiting room - edit name and avatar while waiting for game to start
Late join support - players can join games in progress as spectators
Auto-submit partial definitions when timer expires (LOU-36)
Changed default submission timer to 60 seconds (LOU-27)
Added voting phase timer for consistent pacing (LOU-31)
Real-time vote announcements during voting phase (LOU-26)
Improved TTS voice selection - excludes novelty/whisper voices (LOU-24)
Cleaner definitions - semicolons replaced with commas (LOU-33)
